resources.string: This application is provided by the Identity and Passport Service for the sole purpose of reading the data stored on the chip of a UK ePassport. It cannot be used to determine if a passport is genuine or valid. It is provided free of charge and without warranty.

Enter the passport number, date of birth and date of expiry printed inside the passport. This information is used to unlock the chip. Then close the passport and place the phone centrally on top of the passport. Don\'t move it. After about 10 seconds the phone will display the data stored on the chip.
